result.title: Ethics and Gender Equality Requirements Report
result.description: The report on the implementation of the ethics and gender equality requirements, including progress on gender equality achieved by the project, the procedures for treatment of private data that will be implemented for data collection, storage, protection, retention and destruction and confirmation that they comply with national and EU legislation (GDPR: General Data Protection Regulation - EU General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679), and applicable national law). The Ethics and gender equality requirement report will also include templates of the informed consent forms and information sheets.

result.title: Project Website and Social Networks Presence
result.description: The website where all digital and printed communications materials shall be compliant with the relevant EC H2020 guidelines and will be made available here. The NextOcean website will be a centralised repository containing the basic project information, such as project scope, description, goals and expected achievements, and will also be a centralised, continuously updated repository of information on the project’s activities and public material, such as the support to the online training events.Regarding other social network, and to avoid dispersion, and keep the focus, the project will favor a LinkedIn account, as a professional network.

result.title: Paper on stabilisation of HCA by transesterification
result.description: This deliverable will be a journal paper describing the methods and results on stabilisation of HCAs using transesterification. This will include optimal reaction conditions such as solvent composition, substrate concentration, enzyme load, time, pH and temperature.

result.title: Paper on stabilisation of HCA by encapsulation
result.description: This deliverable will be a journal paper describing the methods and results on stabilisation of HCAs by encapsulation. This will include testing of different polymers such as: chitosan, poly-lactic-acid, poly (3-hydroxybutyrate) (PHB), and poly ethylene glycol (PEG). Factors such as release profile of the active ingredient from the encapsulating material and skin permeation will be reported.

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

result.title: IWT/icing facilities ready for (s)AW tests
result.description: IWT and icing facilities ready for the testing of sAW devices The ice wind tunnels and other icing facilities ice adhesion tester freezing delay devices tc utilised to test the performance of the acoustic devices for deicing should be modified to enable the introduction of the icing platforms and the wiring connections with the electronic placed outside the setup When possible observation window for optical andor spectroscopic observation would be also incorporated in these facilities These modified icing facilities constitute the basis of this deliverable
